# Experience

## Internship Experience

### Public Health Intern — Program for Appropriate Technologies in Health (PATH)  
**Geneva, Switzerland · February–May 2025**
- Forecasted demand and identified target pricing for essential maternal health medications, including Tranexamic Acid and Misoprostol.  
- Developed a **CatBoost-based machine learning pipeline** to predict antibiotic prescription and delayed hospitalization using TIMCI pediatric health data.  
- Addressed **extreme class imbalance** and **facility-level clustering**, and engineered complex clinical outcome features to improve model performance.
